description: A simple to-do list with Local Storage saving system.

description: An unfinished RPG prototype. Very few features, but it actually runs.

description: The beta version of my film/game studio website. It stayed online for around a month.

description: The second beta of the website for the Ametyst Minecraft server. It never got released, but the project might come back stronger soon.

name: Virus
description: A remote access virus coded in middle school to control school PCs, launch programs, disable projector freezes, and more. Fully functional but never actually used.

name: Discord Token Grabber
description: A Python script that grabs Discord tokens (browser & app) on Windows and sends them via webhook. 100% functional but never used.

name: Textboard Bot
description: A bot made for an AYWEN event called Textboard, generating ASCII art drawings automatically.

name: Py-Cours
description: A collection of all my Python courses and exercises.

name: Random Game
description: A random game prototype. Most likely non-functional since I never even tested it before adding it to the graveyard.

name: PasNetflix
description: A self-hosted website to watch your own videos. Drop your files in a folder and play them from the browser.
